description:
Law`s attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo`s power has depths which he and Luffy haven`t bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!
Confrontation brutale de haki. Luffy vs. Doflamingo
Zusammenprall der Haki – Ruffy gegen De Flamingo
覇気激突 ルフィVS[たい]ドフラミンゴ
